column3:
Bill and Steve went to the park. It was a nice Saturday afternoon. They both rode their bicycles to the park. Bill and Steve were hoping to use the swings, but when they showed up, the swings were being used by Anne and Susan. 
ewline
ewline"Can we use the swings?" Bill asked the two girls, hoping they were almost done.
ewline
ewline"Not now," said Anne. "We have only been here for a little bit." 
ewline
ewlineBill was disappointed, but there were so many other things to do at the park. Bill and Steve went to the slide. Up and down they went, faster and faster, every time! It became a race, Bill and Steve ran back to the ladder as quickly as they could so they could go down again.
ewline
ewlineAfter a half hour, the two boys were very tired from climbing the ladder and flying down the slide so quickly over and over. They went to their bikes to go back home. As they started going home, they saw Anne and Susan had left. They could use the swings before going home!
column4: multiple: When did the boys get to use the swings?
column5: The boys did not want to use the swings
column6: When they got to the park
column8: When they pushed Anne and Susan off of them
column9: one: Who went to the park?
column14: one: Did Anne and Susan let the boys use the swings?
column16: They let the boys use the swings when Bill traded them his bike
column17: The girls were not on the swings
column18: They got off the swings and let the boys use them
column19: multiple: What or who did the boys first play with at the park?
